name: Case Closed!
description: Inspired by  Detective Conan, Tantei Gakuen Q, andThe Hajime Kindaichi Files,  Case Closed! is a  game where you play as a member in a group of young adults that somehow attract crime with their presence. Good thing all of you are excellent detectives and are more than equipped to deal with the situation at hand. Will you be able to solve the mystery and uncover the culprit's true identity in time? Or will they manage to escape? Well, there's one way to find out...  the truth will be revealed!
